tips.text: Best queso in Denver. They sell 1/2 orders though not on the menu. True tex-mex spot. Texas natives, rejoice!
"Quiero Arepas" all the way! Great CO beer selection and of course, trendy! Will bring all guests I have from my family to friends. Great view of the city!
Buffalo seitan wings. Don't expect them to taste like chicken...they're better!
Voted Best Overall Wine List  in Westword's Best of Denver 2011!
It's been over 25 years since Sushi Den opened and there's still a wait every night. That's some real staying power, folks. [Eater 38 Member]
The Franklin is the new breakfast of champions
To make the perfect bagel, you need three key components: a great recipe, a flexible process managed by a knowledgeable bagel maker, and New York water, says Josh Pollack.
How are you even real? Massive flaky biscuits are topped with errythang from herbaceous gravies to fruit compotes. Great little beer list, killer brunch cocktails, and pizza for later.
Heart the Rosie Palmer (a Hibiscus Tea & Lemonade blend) & always up for the Blue Plate Special w/ incredible gravy!
Try the Beignets
Table 6 treats each guest like a good friend.
The best looking serving crew in the city. Come for the food, stay for the babely service.
The Cinco Burger combines the best of TAG Burger Bar's already fantastic burgers into one gloriously gluttonous meatwich unrivaled by anything else available in Denver.
very cool little house that has amazing coffee and food. a must try if you're in the area!
I just cried over my donut because my vegan soul left my body and floated to heaven. Seriously. The apple walnut donut is god's gift to humans. Can't wait to try every thing else. Oy vey.
Mojitos and the entres are sick!
Thumbs up for Pinche. Pinche means the F word btw
Try the super meat combo or the vegetarian combo
This place feels like Mexico City. I hope the tortas are equally as authentic. #Eee!
How am I not the mayor? I have 23 checkins. Screw you Kat S!
Say hi to Mary, the owner.  This place has been hooping since it opened December 13.  I'm proud to have been first-ever customer, and I keep coming back.
This place is awesome! Really cool local vibe. Great tacos. And feel good knowing that you're eating fresh beard-free food.
Beautiful patio and great selection of beers and margs that won't break the bank. Extra long happy hours from 3-8 every day.  Nice addition to east Colfax!
best Asian bistro in Denver hands down.
Be sure not to overlook the Bulletproof Coffee. It's a little weird at first but the grass-fed butter and coffee combo is delicious. Breakfast in a glass!
Best happy hour sushi in town. Try the Cherry Bomb. And you might want to double up.
Not your momma's avocado toast. Seed bread, crispy chickpeas, smoked almonds and date molasses - do not skip the egg. This was divine.
Clayton needs a big tip every time. ... always tip Clayton at least 30%
Terrific Neapolitan style pizza. Amazing value.
Try one of the many hot dogs made from elk, pheasant or rattlesnake and load it up with caramelized onions and cream cheese.
The sandwiches are simple, yet sheer genius. You cannot go wrong with any of the eight sandwich options at the Best Sandwich Shop for 2013.
Make sure to catch the live music sets!!
Order the bottomless blood orange mimosas off the brunch menu!
Go to Steuben's, get the Mac and Cheese!
Awesome place! Individual pizzas that cook in 2.5 minutes. Great service and prices!
The Cajun Benedict and the chicken fried eggs with buffalo hash. Plus everything else, this place is bomb
Chicken vindaloo is nice and spicy
It's all good at Snooze. Don't be afraid to customize your pancake if what you're craving isn't on the menu.
Amazing for GF types! Great selection of sides and meats!
This place would be 100% perfect if all of the cute hipster boys who work/hang out here would randomly break into song once in a while. Otherwise, it's pretty great.
great views, good food and drinks. Its a must
The Reuben is to die for. Well, maybe not to *die* for, but I would definitely kill a man for it.
Voted Best Pancake in Westword's Best of Denver 2011!
Order the crispy tuna. It's the best!
Wow!  The green chili sauce is amazing.
This place is great, and a real family restaurant. Owners are friendly and staff us very attentive. Food is simply excellent, just remember it's all kosher.
The Cookies & Cream shake & Truffle Parmesan fries are AMAZING!!!
Get the Cricket Burger -- a half-lb. patty with your choice of 21 different toppings. --Adam Richman, Man v Food Nation
The tuna burger paired with a glass of Prisoner wine is delightful.
Amazing deals before 5pm! All wine is $5 🍷 get a bruschetta platter to go with it, so yum!
